Uses of Class
common.DigitalSignature

  • Packages that use DigitalSignature 
    Package Description
    batch  
    common
    Contains shared foundational utilities for byte-level data handling and low-level operations.
    heif
    Provides high-level classes for parsing and manipulating HEIF-based files.
    jpg
    Classes for parsing and manipulating JPEG-based files are found here.
    png
    Functionality for parsing and processing PNG image files is provided here.
    tif
    Classes for parsing and manipulating TIFF-based files.
    webp

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      DigitalSignature MediaFile.getMediaFormat()

      Constructs a MediaFile instance with the specified file path, capture date, and format signature.

      Constructs a MediaFile instance with the specified path, date, format, and metadata status.
